name: An Arm for a Hook
description:
Things as a pirate cost an arm and a leg... or rather an arm for a hook! You play as Gerald who is but a simple pirate trying to get to his treasure. Try as he might, without things such as an eyepatch, hook and pegleg he doesn't really feel like much of pirate at all! Collect Dabloons in order to buy these augmentations and make your way to the treasure! But be warned... sometimes less is more when you're in the business of cutting off body parts!

Movement: " WASD"

Pull up Buy Menu: "F"

Attack with Hook: "E"

Jump higher with Pegleg: "W or Spacebar"

See farther with Eyepatch: Defaults
